column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time is Chicago and Lou was highly recommended. We went on a Friday night and the wait was not bad
column2: 15 minutes or so. We preorder the Original Deep Dish when we came in. It was fantastic. The sauce was light and fresh tasting. I could taste the tomatoes. The cheese was perfect. The sausage was excellent. And the Croat was out of this world. I expected a pizza that heavy and over salt and not fresh tasting since I had deep dish before
column3: but this was outstanding. I highly recommend Lou when you come to Chicago.
